name: Crazy Asteroids
description:
Defend Earth from asteroids by shooting them! To score points you need to shoot them and just destroying them with ship won't score any points.

Creator's highscore in Extreme mode: 3983

Controls

A, D/left arrow, right arrow - moving

Space/LMB - shooting

Credits

Made for Blackthornprod's discord server's monthly contest - March 2018 (theme: End of the World)

Blackthornprod YT channel
